name: Gems in the Winter
description:
Title: Gems in the Winter

Platform: Browser/PC

Genre: 3D Platformer

Game Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 8+, Casual Gamers

Overview: Collect crystals in this short, but sweet, winter themed 3D platforming adventure!

Controls: WASD to move and Space to jump. Press Space mid-air for a double jump. Might come in handy!

Game Design Team:

Tucker Cox - Game Designer

Link to the game on Unity: https://play.unity.com/mg/other/my-lego-game-20
